page.title: 15Crackley
page.content: Crackley is mostly residential and industrial land. In Crackley there is one school which is a Primary School. There is not entertainment except the Youth Club which is very popular. There are no wine or snack bars but fish and chip shops are available. Derelict land covers a vast area of Crackley which is good playing land even though it could be quite dangerous. The grafitti spoils Crackley because there is so much on doors, walls, floors and especially bus shelters. It's a pity someone can't come up with a solution to stop this. If the council got together with local people perhaps the overgrown gardens and litter could be worked out as a community programme. If there was a competition for the best kept area that might help.
